description.text:
Poor dog, he seems famished! 
You should take good care of 'dog' or the $(b;winter)Winter Court$() will claim him. Maybe you can $(b;spring)cook$() him some $(b;autumn)dog food$()?

Dog! Doggie! Come here! 
Darling made you some food! 
Aww look he likes it!

...We can't keep calling him 'dog' he needs a proper name!
Don't worry, you will never know his real name! So it's fine!
